title: AWS Enterprise Multi-Account Architecture to Azure: Organizational Complexity and Enterprise Governance at Scale
description: Master enterprise-scale organizational complexity by designing and implementing sophisticated AWS multi-account architectures with Organizations, Control Tower, and Service Catalog, then migrating to Azure with Management Groups, Blueprints, and enterprise governance frameworks for complex organizational structures.
certificationWeight: 26% - Design Solutions for Organizational Complexity Domain
prerequisites: Advanced understanding of enterprise architecture patterns
Knowledge of enterprise governance and compliance requirements
Understanding of large-scale networking and security architectures
learningObjectives: Implement enterprise-grade governance and compliance frameworks
Configure centralized identity and access management
Set up automated account provisioning and management
Design cross-account networking and resource sharing
Implement enterprise cost management and chargeback

businessScenario.description: MegaCorp International, a Fortune 100 company with 50,000 employees across 25 countries, needs to migrate their complex IT infrastructure to the cloud while maintaining strict governance, compliance, and security requirements across 200+ business units.
requirements: Support for 200+ separate business units with varying compliance needs
Cross-border data residency and sovereignty compliance
Scalable identity federation across multiple domains

sections.title: Enterprise Multi-Account Architecture Design
sections.content: Design and implement sophisticated organizational unit structures for complex enterprise requirements.

hands-on.aws:
1. Design OU structure for business units, environments, and compliance zones
2. Set up AWS Organizations with nested OUs
3. Configure Control Tower for automated account provisioning
4. Implement Service Control Policies (SCPs) for governance
5. Set up account factory with custom configurations
6. Configure cross-account IAM roles and permissions
7. Implement automated account lifecycle management
hands-on.azure:
1. Design Management Group hierarchy for enterprise structure
2. Set up Azure AD tenant and subscription organization
3. Configure Azure Blueprints for standardized deployments
4. Implement Azure Policy for governance enforcement
5. Set up subscription factory with ARM templates
6. Configure cross-subscription RBAC and resource access
7. Implement automated subscription management

sections.title: Enterprise Identity and Access Management
sections.content: Implement sophisticated identity federation and access management for complex organizational structures.

hands-on.aws:
1. Set up AWS SSO with multiple identity sources
2. Configure SAML federation with corporate directories
3. Implement permission sets and access management
4. Set up cross-account access with federated identities
5. Configure privilege escalation and temporary access
6. Implement identity governance and compliance
7. Set up automated access reviews and certifications
hands-on.azure:
1. Configure Azure AD with hybrid identity integration
2. Set up Azure AD B2B for external collaboration
3. Implement Conditional Access policies
4. Configure Privileged Identity Management (PIM)
5. Set up cross-tenant access management
6. Implement identity protection and risk management
7. Configure access reviews and entitlement management

sections.title: Enterprise Networking and Connectivity
sections.content: Design complex enterprise networking architectures with hybrid and multi-cloud connectivity.

hands-on.aws:
1. Design hub-and-spoke architecture with Transit Gateway
2. Set up cross-account VPC peering and sharing
3. Configure AWS Direct Connect with multiple VIFs
4. Implement Network ACLs and security groups at scale
5. Set up DNS resolution across accounts and on-premises
6. Configure centralized network monitoring
7. Implement network segmentation for compliance
hands-on.azure:
1. Design Virtual WAN architecture for global connectivity
2. Set up cross-subscription VNet peering and sharing
3. Configure ExpressRoute with multiple circuits
4. Implement NSGs and Azure Firewall policies
5. Set up Azure DNS and private DNS zones
6. Configure Network Watcher for monitoring
7. Implement network micro-segmentation

sections.title: Enterprise Governance and Compliance
sections.content: Implement comprehensive governance frameworks meeting complex regulatory requirements.

hands-on.aws:
1. Set up AWS Config for compliance monitoring
2. Configure AWS CloudTrail for audit logging
3. Implement AWS Security Hub for security posture
4. Set up AWS GuardDuty for threat detection
5. Configure compliance reporting and dashboards
6. Implement automated remediation workflows
7. Set up multi-region compliance replication
hands-on.azure:
1. Configure Azure Policy for compliance enforcement
2. Set up Azure Security Center for security management
3. Implement Azure Sentinel for threat detection
4. Configure Azure Monitor for audit logging
5. Set up compliance dashboards and reporting
6. Implement automated policy remediation
7. Configure cross-region compliance monitoring

sections.title: Enterprise Cost Management and FinOps
sections.content: Implement sophisticated cost management and financial operations for complex organizations.

hands-on.aws:
1. Set up Cost and Usage Reports with custom dimensions
2. Configure detailed billing with cost allocation tags
3. Implement chargeback and showback mechanisms
4. Set up enterprise budgets and cost controls
5. Configure cost anomaly detection and alerts
6. Implement Reserved Instance management at scale
7. Set up cost optimization automation
hands-on.azure:
1. Configure Cost Management with custom scopes
2. Set up detailed billing with resource tagging
3. Implement cost allocation and chargeback
4. Configure enterprise budgets and spending limits
5. Set up cost anomaly detection and notifications
6. Implement reservation management at scale
7. Configure automated cost optimization

sections.title: Enterprise Resource Sharing and Collaboration
sections.content: Implement secure resource sharing and collaboration across complex organizational boundaries.

hands-on.aws:
1. Set up AWS Resource Access Manager (RAM)
2. Configure cross-account resource sharing
3. Implement Service Catalog for standardized resources
4. Set up centralized logging and monitoring
5. Configure shared services architecture
6. Implement data sharing with appropriate controls
7. Set up collaboration workflows and approvals
hands-on.azure:
1. Configure Azure Lighthouse for service provider access
2. Set up cross-subscription resource sharing
3. Implement Azure Managed Applications
4. Configure centralized monitoring with Azure Monitor
5. Set up shared services architecture
6. Implement secure data sharing mechanisms
7. Configure workflow automation and approvals

commonIssues.issue: Complex inter-account networking causing connectivity issues
commonIssues.solution: Implement proper routing tables and security group configurations with network segmentation

commonIssues.issue: Policy conflicts causing resource access failures
commonIssues.solution: Implement policy hierarchy with explicit allow/deny rules and proper inheritance

commonIssues.issue: Cost allocation inaccuracies across business units
commonIssues.solution: Implement comprehensive tagging strategy with automated enforcement and validation

commonIssues.issue: Compliance violations due to resource drift
commonIssues.solution: Implement automated drift detection and remediation with immutable infrastructure patterns
